_comment: Shared translations used across the application

trustedCircle.title: Your Trusted Circle
trustedCircle.subtitle: The people you trust to help protect and care for your family and legacy.
trustedCircle.informedOfRole: Has been informed of their role

responsibilities.bankAccess: Can access all bank accounts to pay bills and manage household expenses.
responsibilities.inheritAssets: Will inherit the family home, cabin, and all savings.
responsibilities.medicalPower: Has medical power of attorney to make healthcare decisions.

responsibilities.childCare: Will care for our children if both parents are gone.
responsibilities.estateExecution: Will execute our final wishes and manage estate settlement.
responsibilities.businessManagement: Can step in to manage Johnson Contracting LLC temporarily.

responsibilities.businessAuthority: Has authority to manage business operations and sign contracts.
responsibilities.buySellAgreement: Will purchase my business shares per our buy-sell agreement.

responsibilities.backupGuardian: Backup guardian for children if primary guardian cannot serve.

legacyBriefing.create_and_manage_sealed_messa_4: Create and manage sealed messages for your loved ones
legacyBriefing.failed_to_load_your_time_capsu_1: Failed to load your time capsules
legacyBriefing.are_you_sure_you_want_to_delet_2: Are you sure you want to delete this time capsule?
legacyBriefing.create_meaningful_messages_for_7: Create meaningful messages for your loved ones to receive in the future

errors.textContentRequired: Text content is required for text messages
errors.unlockDateRequired: Unlock date is required when condition is date
errors.notFoundOrCannotModify: Time capsule not found or cannot be modified
errors.notFoundOrCannotDelete: Time capsule not found or cannot be deleted
errors.missingUploadFields: Missing required fields: fileName, fileType, fileSizeBytes
errors.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Allowed types: webm, mp4, mov
errors.fileSizeExceeds500MB: File size exceeds maximum allowed size of 500MB
errors.premiumRequiredMessage: Video messages are a premium feature. Please upgrade your subscription to use this feature.

notifications.emailSubject: {{senderName}} has left a message for you
notifications.loginToView: Log in to LegacyGuard to view this special message.
notifications.smsNotification: You can also set notifications via SMS if preferred.
notifications.inAppMessage: {{senderName}} has left you a time capsule message: "{{capsuleTitle}}"

footer.tagline: Ohranjanje vaše zapuščine za prihodnje generacije.

hero.title: Zaščitite digitalno zapuščino vaše družine za vedno
hero.subtitle: Varna, intuitivna platforma, ki pomaga družinam organizirati, zaščititi in prenašati najpomembnejše spomine in dokumente med generacijami.
hero.urgencySubtitle: Setup takes just 10 minutes - be the prepared parent your family needs

trustSignals.dataOwnership: Vaši podatki ostanejo vaši - nikoli jih ne prodajamo

community.growing: Pridružite se {{count}} družinam, ki že ščitijo svojo zapuščino

features.title: Zakaj izbrati LegacyGuard?
features.subtitle: Zgrajeno z varnostjo poslovnega razreda in zasnovano za družine, ki cenijo svojo dediščino.

sleepBetter.title: Sleep Better Tonight
sleepBetter.description: Stop worrying about 'what if something happens to me.' Your family will know exactly what to do, where to find everything, and who to call.

noChaos.title: No Frantic Searching
noChaos.description: Your family won't spend days looking through drawers, calling banks, or trying to guess passwords. Everything important is organized in one secure place.

clearInstructions.title: Step-by-Step Guidance
clearInstructions.description: Your loved ones get clear, simple instructions for exactly what to do and when. No confusion, no guesswork, no stress during difficult times.

security.title: Absolutna zaupnost in zasebnost
security.description: Zasnovano tako, da nobena nepooblaščena oseba ne more dostopati do vaših podatkov. Niti mi. Vaša zasebnost je naša najvišja prioriteta.

guardians.title: Mreža skrbnikov
guardians.description: Določite zaupanja vredne družinske člane in prijatelje kot skrbnike, da zagotovite kontinuiteto zapuščine.

storage.title: Varna hramba v oblaku
storage.description: Redundantne varnostne kopije v več podatkovnih centrih z 99,99% garancijo delovanja.

timelock.title: Časovno zaklenjen dostop
timelock.description: Določite pogoje, kdaj in kako lahko upravičenci dostopajo do vaše digitalne dediščine.

stories.title: Osebne zgodbe
stories.description: Ustvarite bogate večpredstavnostne pripovedi, ki ujamejo bistvo potovanja vaše družine.

preservation.title: Vseživljenjsko ohranjanje
preservation.description: Vaša dediščina se ohranja za nedoločen čas z avtomatsko migracijo formatov in posodobitvami.

errors.renewFailed: Označevanje dokumenta kot podaljšanega ni uspelo.
